internal.content:
---
title: IBM Cloud Pak for Data - Anomaly Detection from Streaming Events
description: IBM Cloud Pak for Data - Anomaly Detection from Streaming Events
---

Now we shall show how to use Cloud Pak for Data for anomaly detection from streaming events using an anomaly detection model deployed in Watson Machine Learning.

 ![1](./images/cp4d-async.png)

---
title: IBM Cloud Pak for Data - Anomaly Detection from Streaming Events
description: IBM Cloud Pak for Data - Anomaly Detection from Streaming Events
---

Now we shall show how to use Cloud Pak for Data for anomaly detection from streaming events using an anomaly detection model deployed in Watson Machine Learning.

 ![1](./images/cp4d-async.png)
